titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate with respect to free trade negotiations that could adversely impact consumers of sugar in the United States as well as United States agriculture and the broader economy of the United States

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/13/2005--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that the President should negotiate and sign free trade agreements that are comprehensive in scope in order to ensure that the entire U.S. economy can benefit from new market opportunities provided by such agreements.
